踶字的基本解释

踶
dì
用蹄子踢、踏：“怒则分背相踶”。

踶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dì］
［《廣韻》特計切，去霽，定。］
(1)踢。
(2)踏；踩。
[②]［zhì］
［《廣韻》池爾切，上紙，澄。］
见“踶2跂”。
[③]［chí］
［《集韻》陳知切，平支，澄。］
通“馳1”。
快跑。

踶字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　踶； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1229第25
【廣韻】特計切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】大計切，?音弟。【說文】躗也。【玉篇】蹋也。【前漢·武帝紀】故馬或奔踶而致千里。【註】聲類曰：踶，躡也。師古曰：蹋也。【莊子·馬蹄篇】怒則分背相踶。【音義】《通俗文》云：小蹋謂之踶。　又【集韻】【韻會】?田黎切，音題。蹏或作踶，獸足也。　又【廣韻】池爾切【集韻】丈尒切，?音豸。【莊子·馬蹄篇】踶跂爲義。【音義】用心力貌。　又【集韻】?知切，音馳。與踟同。【禮·三年問】踟躕焉。【釋文】踶，音馳。或作踟。　又【集韻】上紙切，音是。【類篇】牛展足謂之踶。

kick
Basic explanation of words
kick
dì
Kick and trample with hoofs: "If you are angry, you will stick to each other."
kick
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dì］
["Guangyun" special plan to cut, go to Ji, set. ]
(1) Kick.
(2) Step on; step on.
[②]［zhì］
["Guangyun" Chi Erqie, on paper, clear. ]
See "踶2跂".
[③] [chí]
["Ji Yun" Chen Zhiqie, flat branch, clear. ]
Link "Chi 1".
Run fast.
kick

【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　踶; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1229-25
[Guang Yun] Special plan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Big plan cut,? Yin brother. [Said Wen] Ming Ye. [Jade articles] 蹋 also. [Previous Han·Wu Emperor Ji] The horse or the horse galloped for thousands of miles. [Note] The sound class said: Fuck, flick. Shi Gu said: 蹋 Ye. [Zhuangzi·Horseshoes] Anger is divided into backs. [Sound and Meaning] "Popular Wen" says: Xiaoqi is called "Fun".　[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Tian Liqie, phonetic title. Rumbling or stinging, animal feet also.　[Guangyun] Chi Erqie [Jiyun] Zhang Qiqie,? Yinzhe. 【Zhuangzi·Horseshoes】Staggering is righteous. [Sound and Meaning] Look hard.　[Jiyun] again? Zhiqie, Yinchi. With the same. [Li·Three Years Questions] Hesitating. 【Explanation】Hey, Yinchi. Or make a kick.　[Jiyun] Cut on paper again, the sound is yes. [Classes] Niu Zhan is called a bitch.
